com.acme.exporter

Class Exporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acme.exporter.Exporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MSExporter

    public class Exporter
extends java.lang.Object
    A buffer between the file system and the program that allows for writing and reading of Excel files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exporter(java.lang.String filename)
      Creates an Exporter object with the given file path.
